evidence.source_document: Motion for Partial Stay Pending Appeal Relief Requested by August 4, 2025
evidence.text:
IN THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE NINTH CIRCUIT
NEETA THAKUR, et al.,
Plaintiffs-Appellees,
V.

Defendants-Appellants.
On Appeal from the United States District Court
for the Northern District of California

extracted.value: Appeal: DONALD J. TRUMP, et al. appealed to United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit.
